item.title: Version 1.0.2
item.description:
We update Hack Rides app frequently to improve your services and customer success.
- We fixed an issue with payment authorization when booking a trip via QR code. - We fixed a bug that sometimes caused the driver icon to move irrationally while navigating to a customer. - We updated the layout of the pickup location to also show the address label.
Hope you appreciate our app and we want to be part of your success. We love to hear your feedback or questions, please contact us hackrides.com
